Text: So you know russian too. Very good !!
I had to study it to decipher the commentary in my Russian chess books of which I had lots as I was an amateur chess player during my school days!

I bow to you. I always found it difficult going through chess books even when they were in english ! The only book i managed to leaf through was 'Winning Chess: tactics and strategies' by Ted Nottingham et al. I think the fact that the print was large, helped to an extent.
